metadata.name: Moda Elemental - Gold
metadata.description:
Moda Elemental is a series of work based off “Moda 1” one of my first few pieces minted on the blockchain in early 2021. 
Mixing Japanese aesthetics and surrealism, each element is symbolic of the values that I look towards while navigating a chaotic space. I believe these values and beliefs will keep me on the right path as an artist and stay true to the life I want to build for myself.

Money comes with all sorts of projections and attachments especially when it comes to art. I personally had to unlearn a lot of negative ideas and fears that I had about money and I’m still learning to have a healthy relationship with it.  
“Gold” is a positive reminder that money is neutral, more wealth means more can be used for good and that there is plenty of opportunities for all.
